name: The Game of Life (itch) (Kilz Knight)
description:
The Game of Life

Cellular automaton devised by the British mathematician John Horton Conway in 1970.

Rules of the game

1. Any live cell with two or three live neighbours survives.

2. Any dead cell with three live neighbours becomes a live cell.

3. All other live cells die in the next generation. Similarly, all other dead cells stay dead.

Before hitting GO, Click on squares to give birth to cells ! Try to create a group of living cells and hit GO to see how they evolve !
